questions.question: Have you built ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) pipelines?
Are you comfortable with complex SQL queries and optimization?
Have you worked with big data tools like Spark or Hadoop?
Do you understand data warehousing concepts?
Have you implemented real-time data streaming solutions?
Have you used cloud data services (AWS S3, BigQuery, Snowflake)?
Are you familiar with data modeling techniques?
Have you used workflow orchestration tools (Airflow, Prefect)?
Have you implemented data quality and validation checks?
Have you built data APIs or worked with data integration?
